{{also|抛砖引玉}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=抛砖引玉|lit=to toss a brick to attract the jade}}

===Etymology===
One of the ''{{w|Thirty-Six Strategems}}'', originally in reference to tossing [[brickbat]]s at one's enemy to get an ([[exploitable]]) reaction or win a greater prize.
